desc: Inspired by Colour, Powered by Scent. Enchanted Love is an exciting new brand with a bold & fun range of wax melts & home fragrances. We love creating scents that fill our homes with powerful fragrance & uplifting nostalgia. Cruelty Free. High Quality Wax Melts & Fragrances. Handmade in the UK. Wholesale Opportunities.

layout.text: With powerful fragrances and nostalgic scents
